snippet: An independent investigation found officials at Bob Jones University, blamed sexual-assault victims for their abuse and told victims not to report their cases to the police.
abstract: Independent investigation finds Bob Jones University told sexual abuse victims they were to blame for their situations, some of which took place for long periods of childhood; report says university actively advised victims not to report such incidents to police; respondents to confidential survey detailed hurtful, often startling treatment by the evangelical Christian institution.
lead_paragraph: An independent investigation found officials at Bob Jones University, blamed sexual-assault victims for their abuse and told victims not to report their cases to the police.

headline.main: Bob Jones University Blamed Victims of Sexual Assaults, Not Abusers, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Bob Jones University Blamed Victims of Sexual Assaults, Not Abusers, Report Says
